name: Hentai Girl
description:
Artist: Loki
Hentai Girl is a puzzle game, in which all you need is to swop bricks, in order to make the pictures restored.
But please remember, this game is aiming to make you relax and enjoy life.
So if you cannot get relaxed, you may try “Administrator Mode”.Administrator ModeKeyboard F: Complete Level
Keyboard R: Disrupt the Order RandomlyGame Featuresartworks3000 achievements Relaxing music Trading card and background
